# [Interview #1122: Central Library, Seattle, WA, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1122#20)

#### Question

Will we find out soon where Shardplate comes from?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You will eventually, but it is not the next book.
